Extras information: Here collected all the available songs on the Internet, Canadian composer and singer Gordon Lightfoot, painstakingly collected by me for quite some time. All albums in different formats (mp3 and flac), included in the compilation albums in the best quality of those releases that could find. Tags (title, artist, year of release, genre, the numbers of discs and tracks) from all disks filled. All albums have covers (in a different capacity, taking the best of those that are available for free download). As a bonus, put a few clips (from YouTube), Saturday Night Live show from May 22, 1976 and the show The Hour with George Stroumboulopoulos involving Gordon, weighing 786 mb. If the video does not need - not simply upload data files. A separate distribution did not execute them because I am afraid that they will not enjoy sufficient popular. 
If you have any other albums Gordon Lightfoot not included in this compilation, or the same albums, but at best a - please contact me via comments. Also regard to scan cover. In general, would like to speak with Russian-speaking fans Gordon.  

Deal is conducted through a free and open-source operating system Ubuntu and free torrent client Deluge. From Russia with Love :-)
